# PED::SET_LADDER_CLIMB_INPUT_STATE

## Summary
Control AI peds on ladders

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **LADDER_INPUT_STATE** inputState

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Only appears in lamar1 script.
